main event: A group of six witnesses observed a UFO with three lights (one white and two red) in Toledo, Ohio on April 7, 1967.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 20 minutes,The UFO was described as having a spherical shape at one point,The object appeared to move at varying speeds, including a crawl and then accelerating to over 100 MPH,No sound was heard during the observation,The sighting was corroborated by at least one other person in a different location at the same time.
sighted object: UFO with one white light and two red lights
witness description: A group that included a male aged 37, two males aged 14 and 13, and a female aged 48, all from Toledo, Ohio.
